externalProductId.description: External product identifier when provided alongside a distinct variant externalId

sku.description: Variant SKU or stock keeping unit

barcode.description: General barcode or GTIN value; use `upc` when a UPC-format code is available

upc.description: UPC-format code; when present it overrides any product-level default for this variant

selectedOptions.description: Selected option values describing this variant

items.description: Specific option selections for a product variant

name.description: Name of the option dimension selected by this variant, e.g. Size

value.description: Value for the option dimension, e.g. Medium

price.description: Current selling price for the variant

currency.description: ISO currency code for the price

compareAtPrice.description: List or compare-at price, if available

cost.description: Unit cost attributed to this variant

imageURLs.description: Publicly accessible HTTP URLs for images of the variant. First image should be the primary image.

tags.description: Tags for categorization and filtering. Useful for organizing entities with custom labels (e.g., "priority", "wholesale", "gift")

customFields.description: Custom Fields - allows for arbitrary key-value pairs to be added to an entity. Useful for storing any custom data that is not covered by the other fields.

id.description: Unique system-generated identifier for this entity (read-only)

externalId.description: ID of the entity in the client's system. Must be unique within the tenant.

createdAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was created (read-only)

updatedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entity was last updated (read-only)

tenantId.description: Unique identifier for the tenant that owns this entity (read-only)
